## Description {#details}

Helper class for performant <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/liverange">LiveRange</a> bulk updates.

Calling <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/liverange/#a0b73c8d5ae32ca13dd02ddde86ffd0a2">LiveRange::addSegment()</a> repeatedly can be expensive on large live ranges because segments after the insertion point may need to be shifted. The <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/liverangeupdater">LiveRangeUpdater</a> class can defer the shifting when adding many segments in order.

The <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/liverange">LiveRange</a> will be in an invalid state until <a href="#a3743aaad6337d6a4c483f6c19efa3894">flush()</a> is called.

Definition at line 943 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/liveinterval-h">LiveInterval.h</a>.

## Public Constructors

### LiveRangeUpdater() {#a7f8850300c47772d8ae8a70aab6b1996}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>llvm::LiveRangeUpdater::LiveRangeUpdater (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/liverange">LiveRange</a> &#42; lr=nullptr)</>}
  labels = {["inline"]}>
Create a <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/liverangeupdater">LiveRangeUpdater</a> for adding segments to LR.

LR will temporarily be in an invalid state until <a href="#a3743aaad6337d6a4c483f6c19efa3894">flush()</a> is called.

## Public Member Functions

### add() {#aecdfedd0173a7d04cd7d06d4538dc7bc}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void LiveRangeUpdater::add (<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/liverange/segment">LiveRange::Segment</a> Seg)</>}>
Add a segment to LR and coalesce when possible, just like LR.addSegment().

Segments should be added in increasing start order for best performance.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/liveinterval-h/#l00961">961</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/liveinterval-h">LiveInterval.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/liveinterval-cpp/#l01190">1190</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/liveinterval-cpp">LiveInterval.cpp</a>.
